subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the start of training camp only six weeks away, Dwyane expects LeBron James to be better this coming season now that the will-he-ever-win-a-championship question has been put to rest.
snippet: With the start of training camp only six weeks away, Dwyane expects LeBron James to be better this coming season now that the will-he-ever-win-a-championship question has been put to rest.
